## View class

```typescript
export abstract class View extends Component 
```
**Extends:** [`Component`](Component.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`app`](View.app.md) |  | [`App`](App.md) |  |
|  [`containerEl`](View.containerEl.md) |  | <code>HTMLElement</code> |  |
|  [`icon`](View.icon.md) |  | [`IconName`](IconName.md) |  |
|  [`leaf`](View.leaf.md) |  | [`WorkspaceLeaf`](WorkspaceLeaf.md) |  |
|  [`navigation`](View.navigation.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Whether or not the view is intended for navigation. If your view is a static view that is not intended to be navigated away, set this to false. (For example: File explorer, calendar, etc.) If your view opens a file or can be otherwise navigated, set this to true. (For example: Markdown editor view, Kanban view, PDF view, etc.) |
|  [`scope`](View.scope.md) |  | [`Scope`](Scope.md)<code> &#124; null</code> | Assign an optional scope to your view to register hotkeys for when the view is in focus. |
